thread.title: BRIEF-Western Finalizes Purchase Of Foothills Creamery Ltd.

title: BRIEF-Western Finalizes Purchase Of Foothills Creamery Ltd.

organizations.name: reuters) - western investment company of canada ltd

text: February 26, 2018 / 2:57 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Western Finalizes Purchase Of Foothills Creamery Ltd. Reuters Staff Feb 26 (Reuters) - Western Investment Company Of Canada Ltd : * WESTERN FINALIZES PURCHASE OF FOOTHILLS CREAMERY LTD. * SAYS ‍EXECUTED A PURCHASE AND SALE AGREEMENT FOR PURCHASE OF A 90% OWNERSHIP STAKE IN FOOTHILLS CREAMERY LTD​ * SAYS ‍PURCHASE PRICE FOR DEAL IS SET AT $27.6 MILLION, SUBJECT TO ADJUSTMENTS​ * SAYS WILL OWN 50% OF FOOTHILLS WITH ATB CAPITAL & FOOTHILLS CEO DON BAYRACK RETAINING OTHER 50% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
